name: Punctured Lure - Game Jam Version
description:
Made in two weeks for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2017.

Venture through a quaint, decorative home and prepare yourself for your leap of love! Learn the hard way that perhaps some wishes are best kept to yourself.

Story-rich horror/suspense game.

Suuuuper last minute upload.

Made by Zoe/thislostrose and Nyapurgisnacht

RPGMaker VX Ace. RTP available here: http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages
